pullrequest.title: Check if a parameter value is empty before accessing them in type specific getter functions (solves issue #347)

content.raw:
The warning messages are good, but they can be read as if some code is attempting to produce an int from an empty string. How about:

`gzwarn << "Parameter[" << this->GetName() << "] has no value when attempting to get as an integer.\n"`

Apply to the rest of the warning messages.
content.html:
The warning messages are good, but they can be read as if some code is attempting to produce an int from an empty string. How about:

gzwarn << "Parameter[" << this->GetName() << "] has no value when attempting to get as an integer.\n"

Apply to the rest of the warning messages.
